title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'finish' during JAR creation, it reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: After pressing 'finish' during JAR creation, it reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
EB: When pressing 'finish' during JAR creation, it should complete the JAR creation process successfully without reporting 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JAR creation process.
2. Make sure you have unsaved editors open.
3. Press 'finish' to initiate the JAR creation.
